巴打可否講多啲domestic preference ？係咪指ideologies 例如 民主制度同社會主義咁

liberalism 聽落好似左派所提倡既 自由 平等 民主咁

Defensive realism is a branch of realism, which assumes states pursuit interest maximisation while liberalism does not. Also there are some distinctive assumption of realism that makes it differs with liberalism

Liberalism focus係三方面 ： 民主可以促進和平，因為民主國家好少同民主國家打仗；Trade，Kant同Kantian assumption都係話係anarchy 呢個國際體系入面人都係rational actors，佢地唔會咁輕易同啲已經有貿易關係既國家打仗；international Institutions: 攞黎facilitate peace, provide states with information/ platform in which they can bargain with each other。而係呢三個元素入面，三者都係互有關聯，佢地可以互相影響促進和平（詳見Kantons triangle)，例子有歐盟。

Defensive realism係指係anarchy國際體系入面會有balance of power，security as the most important agenda同security dilemma(results from uncertainty) 出現，所以會分defensive realism同Offensive realism，defensive realism就指有啲國家會增加自身國家既實力，特別係military power，黎保障自己Security

Liberalism focus係三方面 ： 民主可以促進和平，因為民主國家好少同民主國家打仗；Trade，Kant同Kantian assumption都係話係anarchy 呢個國際體系入面人都係rational actors，佢地唔會咁輕易同啲已經有貿易關係既國家打仗；international Institutions: 攞黎facilitate peace, provide states with information/ platform in which they can bargain with each other。而係呢三個元素入面，三者都係互有關聯，佢地可以互相影響促進和平（詳見Kantons triangle)，例子有歐盟。

Defensive realism係指係anarchy國際體系入面會有balance of power，security as the most important agenda同security dilemma(results from uncertainty) 出現，所以會分defensive realism同Offensive realism，defensive realism就指有啲國家會增加自身國家既實力，特別係military power，黎保障自己Security
